overview: A companion to the wildly popular Erotic Cuts, this second instalment is a collection of some of the most erotic, sensual and sexually explicit material ever shot for Greenwood/Cooper Home Video, brought to you in their original director's versions. The combination of the two makes this video, reportedly one of the most explicit in the 10% Productions stable, certainly worth it. The 58-minute production consists of a series of shorts, each increasingly more daring than the previous one. Although two of the shorts are clearly headed toward sex, each features a brand of foreplay that is both romantic and erotic in nature, and the interaction among the models on that level is a turn-on by itself. Each short also features its performers in full nudity, and the caressing and physical touching are prevalent.
title: Erotic Cuts II
